*Audible*

A follow up to [Red Notice](../2021-12-12-red-notice/index.qmd) this time continuing the story through the American court system. Lots of amazing twists and turn as Browder tussles with Russia in the courts.

**Publisher's Description:**
"Chronicles how the author became Putin's number one enemy by exposing the
Russian leader's campaign to steal and launder hundreds of billions of
dollars and kill anyone who stands in his way."
